stimulusHtml: Which of the following represents the contents of nums after the code segment is executed?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

ArrayList<Integer> nums = new ArrayList<Integer>();

nums.add(3);
nums.add(2);
nums.add(1);
nums.add(0);
nums.add(0, 4);
nums.set(3, 2);
nums.remove(3);
nums.add(2, 0);
